biotools.summary: Open-source software able to automatically mutate any residue positions and find the best amino acids in an arbitrary protein structure without requiring pairwise approximations. It is based on CHARMM and it searches automatically for mutations optimizing a protein folding free energy.

bioschemas.name: ProtDes
bioschemas.summary: Open-source software able to automatically mutate any residue positions and find the best amino acids in an arbitrary protein structure without requiring pairwise approximations. It is based on CHARMM and it searches automatically for mutations optimizing a protein folding free energy.
